EmailTemplate.name: LE-202207-FM-REG-HEV.Phase 6 - Speakers - Registrants
EmailTemplate.subject: Newly announced speakers for Forum 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Boston + Virtual | July 20-22, 2022
The roster of global leaders you’ll hear from at Forum 2022 continues to grow! Get ready to explore topics such as caring for an aging population, achieving health equity, virtual care policy updates and more with these and other experts.
FEATURED SPEAKERS
Ken Yale, DDS, JD, DS Chief Executive TRICARE Health Plan
Beth Kreofsky, MBA Operations Manager Mayo Clinic
David Rhew, MD Global Chief Medical Officer & Vice President of Healthcare Microsoft Corporation
Keynote session
Join this Grammy award-winning composer and conductor—and creator of the Virtual Choir—to explore the power of leadership and technology to foster creativity and connection, even in the most challenging circumstances.
Eric Whitacre
We look forward to seeing you at Forum!
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
